full_text:
PURPOSE.

	The purpose of this Article is to prevent the displacement of tenants and the loss of rental units in the City of Los Angeles due to the foreclosure of the property, and to prevent homelessness and nuisances and blight caused by vacant foreclosed properties.

1.name:
Eviction Of Tenants From Foreclosed Residential Rental
Properties
1.label: article

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

PURPOSE. (§ 49.90)

  PURPOSE.

	The purpose of this Article is to prevent the displacement of tenants and the
loss of rental units in the City of Los Angeles due to the foreclosure of the
property, and to prevent homelessness and nuisances and blight caused by vacant
foreclosed properties.
